articles.author: Scott Roxborough
articles.title: ‘Anatomy of a Fall’ Wins Best Film at 2023 European Film Awards - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Sandra Hüller won best actress, Justine Triet took best director and shared the best screenplay honor with Arthur Harari for the French courtroom drama.
articles.content:
Justine Triet’s acclaimed French courtroom drama Anatomy of a Fall has won best film at the 2023 European Film Awards, held Saturday evening, Dec. 9 in Berlin.
